item.title: Custom Staking System
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

I really want to add Staking into my server. And i think i have gotten somewhere with it. But i have some errors. And you people are all more advanced then me. So maybe you can figure this out? Errors:

stakeHandler.java:19: illegal start of type }else{ ^ stakeHandler.java:19: ';' expected }else{ ^ stakeHandler.java:20: <identifier> expected c.sendMessage("Either You OR Your Opponent Does Not Have 1M On them!"); ^ stakeHandler.java:20: illegal start of type c.sendMessage("Either You OR Your Opponent Does Not Have 1M On them!"); ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

This is my Staking system: (Very simple…)

[CODE]import java.io.*;

/* Staking System
made by Puyrscape, Burning, Joshinator;
Thnx for using !
*/

public class stakeHandler {

public void stake(client c) {
c.sendMessage(“Sending Duel Offer”);
c.play2.sendMessage(“Someone has offered you to a duel arena fight! Staking:1M!”);
c.teleportToX = 3366;
c.teleportToY = 3251;
c.play2.teleportToX = 3386;
c.play2.teleportToY = 3251;
c.txt4 = “FIGHT!”;
c.play2.txt4 = “FIGHT!”;
}else{
c.sendMessage(“Either You OR Your Opponent Does Not Have 1M On them!”);
}
}//end of Staking Handler By Burning, Puyrscape, Joshinator[/CODE]
mmm… Anyone help?

Read full topic
